```py
Online Sales for Focus Brands =
  CALCULATE([Sum Online Sales]
        ,USERELATIONSHIP('Online Sales'[Brand per Month]
                        ,'Focus Brands'[Brand per Month]
                        )
        ,USERELATIONSHIP('Focus Brands'[MonthKey]
                        ,'Date'[MonthKey]
                        )
      )
```

```py
Online Sales for Focus Brands =
  CALCULATE([Sum Online Sales]
    ,USERELATIONSHIP('Online Sales'[Brand per Month]
                        ,'Focus Brands'[Brand per Month]
                    )
    ,USERELATIONSHIP('Focus Brands'[MonthKey]
                    ,'Date'[MonthKey]
            )
    ,CROSSFILTER('Online Sales'[ProductKey]
                ,'Product'[ProductKey]
                ,None
                )
    )
```
